abstract: DealBook Online; Capgemini agrees all-cash $4 billion deal to buy iGate.
lead_paragraph: The all-cash deal worth $4 billion for iGate comes as Capgemini, based in Paris, tries to bolster its presence in the North American market.

headline.main: Capgemini Agrees to Buy iGate, Merging Rivals Focused on Tech and Outsourcing

snippet: The all-cash deal worth $4 billion for iGate comes as Capgemini, based in Paris, tries to bolster its presence in the North American market.
